XenotypeDef.label: Frankenstein
XenotypeDef.description: An undead being built up of parts from multiple mostly-dead bodies.\n\nWait wasn't the DOCTOR'S name Dr Frankenstein? This should just be called "The Monster" right? Yeah, let's go with that. Monster is a great and highly descriptive name for this kind of creature.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: An undead being built up of parts from multiple mostly-dead bodies.
